args.title: Command Argument
args.completeHelp: You can tweak the argument to your needs before adding it.
args.completeInfo: Note the symbols '[ ]' are just used to show the argument options clearer. These need to be removed.

advanced.title: Advanced Options
advanced.desc1: Adjust or tweak advanced options for your commands.

options.allowedUsersHelp: Type in the username to add to the allowed list. Then either hit enter or comma to add the user to the field.
options.costsHelp: Set the cost amount for the user-role to execute the command.
options.tagsHelp: Set the tags for the command. This will help with searching for commands and/or quick enabling or disabling of commands. (Max: 5)

alias.title: Aliases
alias.desc1: Aliases help to make a command run another. Supported Params: {user} {touser} {arg 0-9}
